articles.title: China's factory sector rose in December, sustained pre-Covid levels - Fox Business
articles.description: Activity in China’s factory sector rose in December as the world’s second-largest economy sustained its recovery to pre-pandemic levels, a business survey showed on Monday, however, increasing cost pressures slowed the pace of expansion.
